titleStmt.title: The excommunication published by the L. archbishop of Dublin Thomas Flemming aliàs Barnwell friar of the Order of S. Francis, against the inhabitants of the diocesse of Dublin, for hearing the masses of Peter Caddell D. of Divinity, and Paul Harris priests, is proved not onely injust, but of no validity, and consequently binding to no obedience. In which treatise is also discovered that impious plot and policy of the aforesaid archbishop and his friars in supplanting the pastors and priests of the clergy, thereby to bring all into the hands of the friars, of whose disorders and foule abuses (especially in this kingdome) something is noted. The second edition, enlarged. By me Paul Harris priest.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Paul, 1573-1635?
Caddell, Peter. aut
Fleming, Thomas, 1593-1666. aut

notesStmt.note: Place and name of publisher from STC.
Includes Fleming's excommunication and petitions by Caddell and Harris to Fleming.
The first leaf is blank, except for ornamental box on recto.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
